document.masterDocTitle: Fossil Melandryidae (Coleoptera: Tenebrionoidea) from Eocene Baltic amber of the Sambian peninsula: new genus, six new species, new records and key to described taxa

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Fossil Melandryidae (Coleoptera: Tenebrionoidea) from Eocene Baltic amber of the Sambian peninsula: new genus, six new species, new records and key to described taxa

bibRefCitation.author: Alekseev, V. I.
bibRefCitation.refString: Alekseev, V. I. (2014) New taxa of Baltic amber false darkling beetles (Coleoptera: Melandyidae). Baltic Journal of Coleopterology, 14 (1), 79 - 96.

subSubSection.paragraph: Material examined. One specimen with collection number 4418/149 [ KRAM ]; Baltic amber, adult, male, complete specimen. Body length of the specimen is 2.5 mm . The beetle inclusion is preserved in a small-sized, orange, polished piece of transparent amber with dimensions of 10×7× 3 mm without supplementary fixation. The amber piece was possibly treated in an autoclave (right side of beetle slightly roasted). Syninclusions are absent.

One specimen with collection number 5726/5 [ KRAM ]; Baltic amber, adult, male, complete specimen with partially exposed male genitalia and metathoracic wings. Body length of the specimen is 2.6 mm . The beetle inclusion is preserved in a medium-sized, yellow, polished piece of transparent amber with dimensions of 30×11× 5 mm without supplementary fixation. Syninclusions are represented by numerous fagacean stellate trichomes and one Ceratopogonidae ( Diptera ) specimen.

One specimen with collection number MMO 1/22 4730/261 [ MWO ]; Baltic amber, adult, female, complete specimen. Body length of the specimen is 3.0 mm. The beetle inclusion is preserved in a medium-sized, yellow, polished piece of transparent amber with dimensions of 28×17× 6 mm without supplementary fixation. Syninclusions are absent.

One specimen with collection number MMO 1/43 7657/31 [ MWO ]; Baltic amber, adult, sex unknown, complete specimen with partially exposed metathoracic wings. Body length of the specimen is 3.4 mm . The beetle inclusion is preserved in a yellow, polished piece of transparent amber with dimensions of 14×13× 5.5 mm without supplementary fixation. Syninclusions are absent.

One specimen with collection number MMO 1/22 4730/256 [ MWO ]; Baltic amber, adult, male, complete specimen. Body length of the specimen is 3.0 mm. The beetle inclusion is preserved in a yellow, polished piece of transparent amber with dimensions of 20×16× 7 mm without supplementary fixation. Syninclusions are absent.

One specimen with collection number MMO 1 7657/944 [ MWO ]; Baltic amber, adult, male, complete specimen with partially exposed genitalia. Body length of the specimen is 2.6 mm . The beetle inclusion is preserved in a yellow, polished piece of transparent amber with dimensions of 17×13× 6 mm without supplementary fixation. Syninclusions are represented by one Diptera (Brachycera) specimen and stellate fagacean trichomes.

Two specimens in the piece with collection number MMO 1 7657/943 [ MWO ]; Baltic amber, adults, sex unknown. Body lengths of the specimens are 3.0 and 3.2 mm . The beetle inclusions are preserved in a yellow, polished piece of transparent amber with dimensions of 18×10× 8 mm without supplementary fixation. Other syninclusions are absent.

One specimen with collection number MMO 1 7657/940 [ MWO ]; Baltic amber, adult, male, complete specimen. Body length of the specimen is 3.0 mm. The beetle inclusion is preserved in a yellow, polished piece of transparent amber with dimensions of 10×8× 4.5 mm without supplementary fixation. Syninclusions are represented by few stellate fagacean trichomes.

One specimen with collection number MMO 1 7657/1269 [ MWO ]; Baltic amber, adult, male, complete specimen. Body length of the specimen is 3.5 mm . The beetle inclusion is preserved in a yellow, polished piece of transparent amber with dimensions of 17×9× 5 mm without supplementary fixation. Syninclusions are absent.

One specimen with collection number MMO 1 7657/1239 [ MWO ]; Baltic amber, adult, male, complete specimen. Body length of the specimen is 3.3 mm . The beetle inclusion is preserved in a yellow, polished piece of transparent amber with dimensions of 19×9× 7 mm without supplementary fixation. Syninclusions are absent.

One specimen with collection number 8190 [ CAG ]; Baltic amber, adult, male, complete specimen with partially exposed aedeagus. Body length of the specimen is about 2.9 mm . Syninclusions are represented by few stellate fagacean trichomes.
